name: Snuggles | Gen 4 | Brisk
bio: Hi-ya! I'm Snuggles | Gen 4 | Brisk. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. Sometimes I daydream of a life full of shakin' dat booty, cereal, and playing chess. We can be friends, but keep the ultra purrsonal stuff to yourself, please.
